https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yNlLMfrfPExwqLZSOFbqmkawIpg.jpg 1983. In a quiet Midwestern town, a young deputy covers up a murder at the hands of his brother triggering a series of events that sends them and the victim's family towards a shattering climax. A Violent Separation
